organic.title: EventMesh - Apache EventMesh Documentation
organic.snippet: Apache EventMesh is a dynamic event-driven application runtime used to decouple the application and backend middleware layer.

organic.title: EventMesh Architecture Overview
organic.snippet: EventMesh is a fully event-driven architecture that supports cloud native applications.
